name: SingletonIterator_removeTest
description: Unit tests for the remove functionality of the SingletonIterator class.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAllowed
test_cases.description: Tests that the iterator can remove the element when allowed.

test_cases.name: testRemoveNotAllowed
test_cases.description: Tests that the iterator throws UnsupportedOperationException when removal is not allowed.

test_cases.name: testRemoveBeforeNext
test_cases.description: Tests that the iterator throws IllegalStateException when remove is called before next.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAfterAlreadyRemoved
test_cases.description: Tests that the iterator throws IllegalStateException when remove is called after the element has already been removed.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAfterReset
test_cases.description: Tests that the iterator throws IllegalStateException when remove is called after the iterator has been reset.
